name: er
description: High-level distributed erasure coding library combining functionality of shuffile and redset

name: redset

name: shuffile
description: Move (shuffle) files on local-storage associated with MPI ranks when re-running MPI jobs that cause different mapping of ranks to nodes

name: rankstr
description: Split an MPI communicator into subcomms based on string values

name: filo
description: Transfers files between local storage and global file system with map to record which MPI rank owns each file

name: scr2veloc
description: Wrapper library to translate SCR calls to VELOC calls
